articles.author: Sanya
articles.title: Alia Bhatt, Ranbir Kapoor pose with Karisma Kapoor in serene 'family' pic from Ambani cruise; fans miss Raha - Hindustan Times
articles.description: More inside photos and videos from Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's second pre-wedding bash in Europe were shared by Karisma Kapoor. | Bollywood
articles.content: Another day, another fresh set of pictures and videos from the Ambani family's star-studded luxury cruise liner. On Saturday, actor Karisma Kapoor to to Instagram to share a happy photo of herself ch… [+2311 chars]
